remarks: Re-index a disjunct collection statement.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Apr-2017.)
statement:
disjrdx.1 $e |- ( ph -> F : A -1-1-onto-> C ) $.
disjrdx.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ y = ( F ` x ) ) -> D = B ) $.
disjrdx $p |- ( ph -> ( Disj_ x e. A B <-> Disj_ y e. C D ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
$d C x y $.
$d D x $.
$d F x y $.
$d ph x y $.
